about_the_game:
Command armies in intense, historically inspired battles where tactics, timing, and battlefield conditions decide the outcome. Every order takes time to be executed, forcing you to think ahead and adapt as the chaos of war unfolds. Face a ruthless AI that maneuvers, flanks, and counters your strategies, making every encounter a true test of skill.

Featuring a distinct visual style that combines military symbols with historical battlemaps, Carthage: Bellum Punicum delivers an immersive experience where every detail of ancient warfare comes to life. Morale, stamina, terrain, and supply lines all play a crucial role—just like they did on the battlefields of history.

HISTORICAL BATTLES

Relive iconic clashes like Cannae, Trasimene, and Trebia, fought on meticulously crafted battlemaps based on detailed historical sources, bringing the intensity and precision of ancient warfare to life.

BATTLEFIELD DYNAMICS

Issue orders to your troops that take time to arrive through messengers, requiring careful planning and adaptability. Master morale, stamina, terrain, and organization to execute complex strategies and outmaneuver your enemies on the ever-changing battlefield.

CHALLENGING AI

Face a highly competent opponent that flanks, retreats, and adapts to your moves. The AI reflects the unique strategies of different historical factions, from the Roman Acies Triplex formations to the Iberians’ relentless harassment tactics, ensuring every battle feels fresh and demanding.

LINEAR CAMPAIGN

Experience the historic journey of Hannibal Barca as he leads his army from Carthage to the heart of Italy. Follow his legendary path against Rome, battling Iberian and Gaulish tribes, crossing the Alps, and confronting the Roman legions. Manage logistics carefully, as supplies take time to reach your army and can be ambushed by bandits along the way. Every decision and delay could change the course of history.

name: Carthage: Bellum Punicum

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6402P or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-10400F or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

short_description: The depth of a war simulation with the chaos of real-time strategy, Carthage: Bellum Punicum plunges you into the Second Punic War. Experience deep battlefield mechanics, a cunning AI, and a unique visual style blending military symbols with realistic battlemaps.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Portugal
